Package com.px100systems.data.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Criteria.Converter<T>
    Converts criteria to the native provider form.
    DbInitializer
    Data Initializer (used for development/debugging)
    EntityProcessor<T>
    In-place entity processor.
    InMemoryDatabase.DataStorageEvents  
    Lock
    Cluster-wide lock.
    TenantLoader
    Tenant Loader - responsible for loading tenants.

    Class Description
    BaseTenantConfig
    Base tenant config.
    CalculatingCriteria
    Criteria verifier - evaluates the criteria on a bean.

    DatabaseStorage
    Persistent database: whether in-memory with write-behind/write-through or traditional one.
    Responsible for scanning the specified entity class packages and registering their SerializationDefinitions.

    Configuration
    tenantLoader - responsible for loading tenant configuration (can be null for non multi-tenant apps).
    DatabaseStorage.EntityInfo  
    Delete
    Entity deletion request - by ID or some filter Condition.
    Entity
    Base stored/persistible entity - a subclass of Storedbean that defines the Long id (mandatory PK).

    Transient fields should be marked with standard Java "transient" modifier (excluded from serialization).
    Use @Index on top-level getters only.
    EntityDescriptor
    Database entity descriptor.
    InMemoryDatabase
    In-memory database with optional write-behind

    This API wrapper encapsulates distributed in-memory storage implemented by InMemoryStorageProvider with an optional write-behind persistence server.
    The general architecture is flat: multiple Web-servers collocated with in-memory storage collocated with optional persistence servers.

    In case of low risk tolerance (e.g.
    InMemoryDatabase.Loader  
    InMemoryDatabase.MessageHandler  
    InPlaceUpdate<T>
    In-place update.
    OrderBy<T>
    Serializable OrderBy element.
    RawRecord
    Serialized data record - used internally by persisters to load and serialize the entity.
    RuntimeStorage
    Non-persistent in-memory storage aka "data grid".
    StoredBean
    Base stored class.
    StoredBean.ReflectionOrderBy<T>  
    TraditionalDatabase
    Traditional (remote) database like Mongo.
    Transaction
    Consumer interface with the data cluster: read or write transaction.
    Business logic code should only interact with Transaction instead of DatabaseStorage.
    Transaction is always limited to one tenant.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InMemoryDatabase.PersistenceMode  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DataStorageException
    Data Storage exception.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    CompoundIndex
    Compound Index class-level annotation.
    Currently not supported by Hazelcast, but fully supported by Ignite and Mongo
    CompoundIndexes
    Compound Indexes class-level annotation.
    Currently not supported by Hazelcast, but fully supported by Ignite and Mongo
    Index
    Index annotation.
    Annotate indexed main entity getters.
    QueryField
    Field used in criteria and "SQL" queries - not necessarily indexed.
    Annotate main entity getters.
